name: Trial of Ascension
description:
A 2D top-down turn-based rogue-like dungeon crawler.

Play as knight who tries to reach the famous lowest floor in the dungeon of ascension. A guardian of the gods sleeps their, waiting for a worthy opponent.

Are you worthy to ascend?

Controls
  • Movement: W, A, S, D
  • Attacking: Press 1, 2 or 3 + Click
  • Rotate: R + Click
  • Visualize Enemy Range: Hold Z
  • Opening Chest: Attack the chest
  • Use Item: 4
  • Drop Item: Right Click on itemframe
  • Restart Stage: K
